ObjectClass.Name: Software
ObjectClass.BaseQuery: SELECT MTIME, USERID, WCMINTERNALVERSION, WCMNATIVE, WCMSTPEXTENSIONDLL, WCOMMENTS, WCOMPANYNAME, WDEFAULT, WFILEDESCRIPTION, WFILEVERSION, WHIVE, WINTERNALNAME, WLANGUAGE, WLEGALCOPYRIGHT, WLEGALTRADEMARKS, WLEGALTRADEMARKS1, WLEGALTRADEMARKS2, WNAMESPACE, WORIGINALFILENAME, WPATH, WPRODUCTNAME, WPRODUCTVERSION, WSUBKEY FROM RADIAOWNER.RNVD_INSTALLED_APPS WHERE ROWNUM < 100
